sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button :class="buttonClasses" :disabled="disabled" @click="$emit('click')">
    <slot />
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'BaseButton',
  props: {
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },
  computed: {
    buttonClasses() {
      return [
        'base-button',
        { 'base-button--disabled': this.disabled }
      ]
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import '@/assets/styles/variables.scss';

.base-button {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 500;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 8px 16px;
    font-size: 14px;
    background-color: $primary-color;
    color: white;

    &:focus {
        outline: none;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.25);
    }

    &:hover:not(:disabled) {
        background-color: darken($primary-color, 10%);
    }

    &--disabled {
        opacity: 0.6;
        cursor: not-allowed;
    }
}
</style>
